text:
@GOP Law & order? -He's the MOST CORRUPT president EVER!
Ending the coronavirus pandemic? -He doesn't even believe it exists.
Restoring the economy? -He has increased the National debt to $26,529,260,218,229, the highest it's been since WWII. 

VOTE FOR @JoeBiden
